TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 28
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Ramon Musquiz, 03-25-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to political chief, March 25, 1828. Returning in due-form report of recent election.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 28

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to political chief, March 25, 1828. Returning in due-form report of recent election.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[From Bexar Archives]*/p*
*p*Remito á V. S. las copias de las listas de elección hechas en esta *location_mentioned*jurisdicion */location_mentioned*de conformidad con los formularios qe V. S. me acompañó con oficio fha *date_mentioned n="03-06-1828">6 del corriente*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Dios y Libertad*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Estevan F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Villa de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="03-25-1828">25 de Marzo de 1828*/date_mentioned*,*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Sor Gefe del Departo C Ramon Muzquiz*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
